sentence.Network_en: All our aircraft have certificates of airworthiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们所有的飞机都有适航证书。

sentence.Network_en: When a plane has passed all the tests it can get a government certificate of airworthiness.
sentence.Network_cn: 飞机经过全部试验合格后,才能获得政府颁发的飞行性能检验合格证.

sentence.Network_en: Airworthiness certification includes Type Certification and Production Certification , and other related work.
sentence.Network_cn: 适航审定主要包括型号合格审定和生产许可审定及其他工作.

entry.def: If an aircraft is airworthy, it is safe to fly.

example.ex: The mechanics work hard to keep the helicopters airworthy.
example.tran: 机修工努力维持直升机的飞行性能。
